cohortName: [PL 81893001] Ulcerative colitis referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (81893) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 81893002] Ulcerative colitis referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (81893) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 81893003] Ulcerative colitis at first diagnosis with no history of ulcerative colitis
logicDescription: Ulcerative colitis at first diagnosis with 365 days continous observation and no history of ulcerative colitis observation. Cohort exist is the end of continous observable time for the person.

cohortName: [PL 81893004] Ulcerative colitis at first diagnosis with a second diagnosis at any time in future, no history of code
logicDescription: Ulcerative colitis at first diagnosis with 365 days continous observation and no history of ulcerative colitis observation with second occurrence at anytime after index date. Cohort exist is the end of continous observable time for the person.
Ulcerative Colitis Ananthakrishnan (2013) 4+ codes out-patient or 2+ codes in-patient
